findings.title: Explicit Type Conversion Not Allowed
findings.description: The contract attempts to convert an integer constant -1 to uint256, which is not allowed and may lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Missing Minting/Burning Implementations
findings.description: The contract has Minting and Burning internal functions but no public/external functions to accompany them. Also, the contract doesn’t mint the initial tokens.

findings.title: The contract doesn’t take snapshots of the state (Balance, TotalSupply) automatically while minting or token transfers
findings.description: The contract fails to capture snapshots of its state variables, specifically Balance and TotalSupply, during minting or token transfer operations.
